description: Contracts related to the Silvertown Tunnel project

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Following a formal procurement process, Transport for London awarded a design, build, finance and maintenance contract in November 2019 for a new twin-bore tunnel between Silvertown and the Greenwich Peninsula in East London."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The contract was awarded toÂ RiverLinx Limited, a consortium made up of Aberdeen Standard Investments, BAM PPP PGGM, Cintra, Macquarie Capital and SK Engineering & Construction.
